revised_title: Chemical and Bacteriological Examination of Sewage
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Microbial Ecology
tldr: The authors conducted a chemical and bacteriological examination of sewage to determine the species of organisms present and their chemical characteristics. They isolated various organisms and studied their reactions to oxygen, finding that some were aerobic and others anaerobic. The research aimed to understand the processes of purification and putrefaction in sewage and the role of different organisms in these changes.
